comments.body: Why doesn't this work on all RHEL based OS?

RHEL (at least centos7, which I tested) does not have a2enmod/a2dismod

As far as I understand debian came up with it and opensuse also implemented it, but independently and with other arguments.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@- name: include only on supported systems
  include: actualtest.yml
  when: ansible_os_family in ['Debian', 'Suse']
  # centos/RHEL does not have a2enmod/a2dismod
